Class AddRoommateActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • atoa.roomates.activities.AddRoommateActivity

  • public class AddRoommateActivity
extends Activity
    class to represent the add roommate screen the class lets the user select contact from his contact list and adds them to the app daat base
